column4: ok screw this, i've delt with this problem like a billion flipping times and it is just escaping me in my old freaking age
how do i get apache / web browser to stop asking me to save the stupid .php output and just display it instead?
that is just the problem joetheodd having at the moment
If you just absolutely can't find the answer, I would try getting Live Http Headers  extension for firefox, then comparing the headers with the problematic server and a server that is working fine.
